controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • controller.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends javafx.application.Application
    This class is the coordinator for the entire Pokemon game, and it aptly named the Controller. As you will see it is not an object, an indeed, almost everything in this class is static. The Controller mediates between the different views that the player will encounter. However, it is these views that contain the event handlers rather than the Controller itself.
    Author:
    Alan D., Paria K., Samantha F., Rajeev R., Scrum Master: Niven Francis, CSC 335 Final Project

      • start

        public void start(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
        This method starts the game with a general view. Right now, only the Safari View is written. Later, the player will always start in the Town View.
        Specified by:
